Package ulb.infof307.g04.modes

Class ReviewMode

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g04.modes.LearningMode
ulb.infof307.g04.modes.ReviewMode
public class ReviewMode extends LearningMode
This class represents the review learning mode, extends LearningMode It contains the attributes and methods specific to the review mode
